original_title: 妻の恋人 熱い視線に犯●れて
overview: A married Japanese woman's lust for a foreign man only grows deeper... Emiko reunites with her late brother's best friend Alex. The two are instantly attracted to each other, and their desire quickly spirals into an affair. Something about the way he looks at her...
tagline: With him, she could fall forever...
title: My Wife's Lover: Touched by His Hot Gaze
